page.title: 05Children's Games, Evesham.
page.content: We play{kick the can.}You have a can, someone is "on" and someone kicks the can. You all hide and the person who is on runs to get the can and put it back on the spot, then he has to look for people. If he sees you he has to tell you the name of the tree or bush you are behind if they call out the wrong bush you say false-call and every one runs in and then the game starts again.************************* A{skipping game}Sandra plays goes like this:" All the boys in our school aren't very nice, except for ..." When they say "for" you have to choose a boy's name and then it goes...."he's all right. Took me to the pictures, sat me on his knee and said darling Sandra will you marry me?"Then it goes "yes, no" until you stop skipping. If it is "yes" then you love him if it is "no" then it means you don't love him.
